titles.title: Heritage Homes Tax Incentive Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an enhanced deduction for qualified residence interest on acquisition indebtedness for heritage homes.
Heritage Homes Tax Incentive Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Heritage Homes Tax Incentive Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to grant a tax deduction (whether or not the taxpayer itemizes deductions) for 125 percent of residence interest paid or accrued on acquisition indebtedness for heritage homes. Defines a "heritage home" as a taxpayer's principal residence that is at least 50 years old and a certified historic structure in a registered historic district.
